name: Vegas By Night - Alliances
description:
Tarjahn, a kindred of the ravnos, has given up hope of bringing the humans and the supernaturals who reside in Vegas together. 

Alissia, a visionary hunter, still believes in a Las Vegas where everyone, human or supernatural, can live freely and fearlessly.

 Alissia and Tarjahn have already attempted to make Vegas the city in which they believe. It failed miserably, resulting in a massive raid by the Second Inquisition on Vegas, which led to the deaths of many kindred and hunters alike. 

The people of Vegas remain unaware of what they have done, but Alissia and Tarjahn must bear the guilt of all the deaths they have caused. Tarjahn refuses to make another try at his purpose and vision.

Alissia will not give up.

Join them as their paths cross again and they reluctantly join forces to achieve a common goal.
